title: Why this damn game has 0 dmg ? (Resulting you cant carry)
body:
What happened to league seriously damage is freaking low its ridicilous i remember in season 4 i could play jinx top start w and do half hp of the enemy at 1 level then if i was enough good boom first blood now i need to do 7 of these same with every other champ every champ was doing 50% of your hp now it does like 20% at max and at late like 1% for assasin poke 10% for bruisers what is this what has Riot done im actually speechless i keep playing playing playing not giving up and is just not possible to win cause my damage simply its not enough if the team is not involved but how am i supposed to carry alone if thats the case im sitting at 50% winrate stuck at silver i was gold and my max was silver 1 99 LP for more than 10 times i was silver 1 99 LP exactly 99 what is this game has become unenjoyable im talking about ranked season 6 ranked was way better from what i rememeber it season 7 too was ok but the more the years pass it gets worse and WORSE why am i getting baited in the damn buffed tower when i have 90 cs on 10 and the enemy has 20 cs and we are same level and i die and i kill him cause he gets level up WHEN STANDING STILL!!! i dont know how to play this game anymore simply afk on tower and watch youtube? lol cause that works too i tried it once right now i dont care almost for my ranked i want to go iron 4 to get new league teams i just play for stats now CS KDA KPC and winrate since those are good i dont care even if i lose.
Do i do something wrong seriously i dont want silver players answer 
and dont tell me to play jungle or something that does 2k dmg in 0.01 second cause thats disgusting 
i wanna play something squishy vs something really tanky and have low damage to vs high damage like that thanks.
P.S The only thing i get is downvotes instead of actual answers congrats.

replies.body:
> Why this damn game has 0 dmg ? (Resulting you cant carry)

The damages are currently the highest in leagues whole history with fucking mages and assassins nuking your as + you're playing adc in bot lane sooooooooooooo unless you're Jhin, Draven, Lucian or Ezreal (Maybe Mf?) you're not doing shit so people realizing this play fucking mages in bot lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Th3KindredSpirit,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EBiEOsRT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-19T08:02:02.563+0000)
>
> The damages are currently the highest in leagues whole history with fucking mages and assassins nuking your as + you're playing adc in bot lane sooooooooooooo unless you're Jhin, Draven, Lucian or Ezreal (Maybe Mf?) you're not doing shit so people realizing this play fucking mages in bot lane.

Ye barely 200 dmg in late game now  if you played AD in season 4 you could do over 3000 dmg with any champ in total now you cant even reach 2000 max on 1 target im gonna unistall this rubbish game tomorrow. 80 milion players pfft lie more in op.gg says 8-7 milion in total and goes lower per year i wonder why the queue time is 3 minutes+ if they are 80 milion players playing when it was 0:10 0:20  seconds in season 3-4 im done talking.

> [{quoted}](name=manolis201,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EBiEOsRT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-19T08:19:03.308+0000)
>
> Ye barely 200 dmg in late game if you play AD in season 4 you could do over 3000 dmg with any champ in total now you cant even reach 2000 max on 1 target im gonna unistall this rubbish game tomorrow. 80 milion players pfft lie more in op.gg says 7-8 milion in total and goes lower per year i wonder why the queue time is 3 minutes+ if they are 80 milion players playing when it was 0:10 0:20  seconds in season 3-4 im done talking.

The queue time is just written to be estimated 3 minute **at all times** despite it rarely ever go past it, even on barely populated server like OCE which only really go past the 3 min mark in queue time in late hours. I guess Riot is just lazy and couldn't be bothered to come up with an actual estimation algorithm thus instead just hard-code the string to be "3 minute" and leave it at that.

Not to mention, that 80 million players obviously isn't talking about just 1 server, but all servers in total (the stats doesn't include the players on Garena server, too, as it was gathered from pulling data from Riot's API). So it's not like you're actually matching with 80 million players at once.

Lastly, that stats concerns the MONTHLY player count, and obviously when talking about the day-to-day player count, it would be significantly lower and only a fraction of the said count. Similarly, it also doesn't state whether or not it's each unique individual players or just the amount of active accounts because we all know smurfs are a thing and many people own a great number of to cycle between them, too.

League is indeed super popular, but let's still be realistic about analysing the stats.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EBiEOsRT,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-19T08:31:47.346+0000)
>
> The queue time is just written to be estimated 3 minute **at all times** despite it rarely ever go past it, even on barely populated server like OCE which only really go past the 3 min mark in queue time in late hours. I guess Riot is just lazy and couldn't be bothered to come up with an actual estimation algorithm thus instead just hard-code the string to be "3 minute" and leave it at that.
> 
> Not to mention, that 80 million players obviously isn't talking about just 1 server, but all servers in total (the stats doesn't include the players on Garena server, too, as it was gathered from pulling data from Riot's API). So it's not like you're actually matching with 80 million players at once.
> 
> Lastly, that stats concerns the MONTHLY player count, and obviously when talking about the day-to-day player count, it would be significantly lower and only a fraction of the said count. Similarly, it also doesn't state whether or not it's each unique individual players or just the amount of active accounts because we all know smurfs are a thing and many people own a great number of them, too.
> 
> League is indeed super popular, but let's still be realistic about analysing the stats.

When doing a few intro bot games for quick missions in the past few months, I discovered that the wait time for those is often 3-4 minutes. Also, the estimate is occasionally around 30 seconds or a minute, not always 3 minutes.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EBiEOsRT,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-19T08:37:24.946+0000)
>
> When doing a few intro bot games for quick missions in the past few months, I discovered that the wait time for those is often 3-4 minutes. Also, the estimate is occasionally around 30 seconds or a minute, not always 3 minutes.

Well, I wouldn't imagine people are too thrilled with playing intro bot seeing it's rather pointless for veterans and there aren't really any new players in the game to make use of the mode atm these days. Though, last time I did use intro bot to cheese some of the missions, I didn't notice the queue time was over 3 min tbh, I'd say my impression was that the queue time for intro bot was about the same as other modes; or maybe OCE is just filled with desperate noobs who want to feel good about themselves, could be a possibility.

As for the estimate, it's also down to personal experience. Because on OCE and my experience, the timer never shows anything other than "Estimated 3 minute" from my immediate memory (though ofc as said, only in the late hours do the queue time actually surpass 3 min), as such I've always assumed it's a static hard-coded message. Mb.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EBiEOsRT,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-19T08:43:49.779+0000)
>
> Well, I wouldn't imagine people are too thrilled with playing intro bot seeing it's rather pointless for veterans and there aren't really any new players in the game to make use of the mode atm these days. Though, last time I did use intro bot to cheese some of the missions, I didn't notice the queue time was over 3 min tbh, I'd say my impression was that the queue time for intro bot was about the same as other modes; or maybe OCE is just filled with desperate noobs who want to feel good about themselves, could be a possibility.
> 
> As for the estimate, it's also down to personal experience. Because on OCE and my experience, the timer never shows anything other than "Estimated 3 minute" from my immediate memory (though ofc as said, only in the late hours do the queue time actually surpass 3 min), as such I've always assumed it's a static hard-coded message. Mb.

From what I've seen, intro bots generally have two experienced players looking for a quick win, two scripters, and one new player. And then, of course, when you load into a match, one bot says lines from two of its teammates (possibly with an error message if one of them is Fidddlesticks), and then you open the shop and your champ has no recommended items, and so on.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EBiEOsRT,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-19T09:00:25.384+0000)
>
> From what I've seen, intro bots generally have two experienced players looking for a quick win, two scripters, and one new player. And then, of course, when you load into a match, one bot says lines from two of its teammates (possibly with an error message if one of them is Fidddlesticks), and then you open the shop and your champ has no recommended items, and so on.

Damn, that's bad. From my personal experience in intro bot on OCE, which does have bots and whatnot here and there, but not this extreme. But who knows.
Um what? lol. Good stuff man, gave me a chuckle.
